record.description: Looking west from 63rd Street to Blackstone Avenue, an Illinois Central train and railway station in the background by James Edwin McBurney. [Photographic copy of painting, a gift of the Illinois Central Railroad].
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Attached to cardboard back, but it is beginning to peel away from its backing. University of Chicago Archives stamp. Caption glued to back is coming free.
